tspan.tspan: Header: must be first. Build the base operating system that it
should use to build the container. Boostrap agent tells from
what kind of images to start. Docker is the most common.
Variables defined for the build process.
Executed on the host system, after the base OS has been
installed. Usefull to clone repos with user priviliges.
You can also access the container file system.
Allows you to copy files into the container with greater safety .
Shell exectuded inside the container. Allows to download files
from the internet, install new software and libraries, write
configuration files, create new directories, etc...
Defines environment variables that will be set ONLY at
runtime, but not at build time.
